data.text: @LastLapLucy Yeh I was thinking the same thing. Maybe it’ll just be Lewis and KMag in the first race? 💀
@LastLapLucy McLaren have said he’s coming up negative so far. Let’s hope it stays that way 🤞🏼
@LastLapLucy @McLarenF1 has said so far he's been tested multiple times and all have been negative but could change
@LastLapLucy At Williams. Fittipaldi & Herta at Haas

@LastLapLucy Gonna be Lewis Only in Bahrain then. Lewis & Nyck at Merc. Lawson & Vips at Red Bull. di Resta & Vandoorne at McLaren. Giovinazzi & Schwartzman at Ferrari. Piastri & Palmer at Alpine. Hauger & Daruvala at Alpha. Hulk & Hawkins at Aston. Kubica & Pourchaire at Alfa Button & Aitkin
@merccurryedes @LastLapLucy This is true. If those who in contact tested negative, they’re all fine
